revtext: Great service by Aysha and her team. We went for my mother with breast cancer. They get to work right after you step in and work with so much pride and professionalism. My sincere thanks to Aysha and her team and appreciate their work. I’d definitely recommend this place for breast cancer patients
revreply: Thank you Vignesh for your kind words and appreciation. We are very pleased to note that your mother was happy with the product - that is the bottom line. We do strive to make a difference in people\'s lives. Our best wishes and blessing to your mother for a quick recovery God Bless you too as her son taking care of her so well :)
